DOC.brief_summary: ANRS 12127 Prenahtest intervention trial conduct four country ( Cameroon , Dominican Republic , Georgia India ) , pregnant woman randomize prenatal care receive either standard post-test HIV counseling , innovative intervention call couple-oriented post-test HIV counseling ( COC ) . The aim COC intervention empower woman communicate male partner HIV , HIV test particular , encourage return HIV test and/or couple HIV counseling ( couple member counsel together ) . Prenahtest first randomise trial test prenatal intervention increase partner HIV testing .
DOC.brief_title: Couple-oriented Prenatal HIV Counseling Low Medium HIV Prevalence Countries
DOC.criteria: Attending first ANC visit current pregnancy study centre Accepting participate study able give inform consent ii Currently partner ( man woman consider regular partner day inclusion , even person baby 's father ) iii Accepting followup ( include home visit necessary ) project staff 15 month delivery Having test HIV current pregnancy Having male partner test HIV gestational period v Having partner work predefined study area absent 6 month Being unwilling/unable provide address/contact information Having intoxication and/or mental impairment moment recruitment
